'''In the Name of Favonius''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete Vile's version of ''[[A Surprise Gift]].''

==Notes==
*A new version of the commission ''A Surprise Gift'' is unlocked each time the player gets it, with the first version being Marjorie's, the second being Quinn's, the third being Sara's, and the fourth being Vile's. The player does not need to choose the new option to unlock the next option. For example, Vile's option will be unlocked even if they played only Marjorie's version for the previous three times.
